product_name: Hiking and Backpacking Trails of Texas - 6th Edition
long_description: Hike Texas with this comprehensive, map-packed trail guide for walkers, hikers and backpackers. Author: Mickey Little. Softcover; 207 pages; black-and-white photos and maps. Lone Star Books; copyright 2006. Features everything from leisurely one- or two-hour strolls for all ages to weeklong backpacking treks. Book is divided into two parts: Main Guide and Backpacking Guide. The Main Guide divides the state into four regions and lists hiking and nature trails within each region with key information on each. The Backpacking Guide lists the most challenging trails along with primitive wilderness camping areas. Detailed maps show you the trails, facilities, actual distances and points of scenic and historical interest.
short_description: Hike Texas with this comprehensive, map-packed trail guide for walkers, hikers and backpackers.
